113131.content:
In the now destroyed and gas filled halls of Punk Hazard, a light buzzing sound could be heard if one were to really concentrate on hearing it. The source was a small metallic insect that bared resemblance to a mosquito.

Created by Doctor Vegapunk himself, it takes DNA from men and women, then creates children from the combined source. It was mostly the World Governments idea, they wanted to look to the public and say that it was for helping areas with population declines, but it was mostly so they could have stronger soldiers by combining the DNA of already powerful humans.

With it being the first and only one of its kind (A 'queen if you will) it was also designed to make drones that act the same as it does, but can't produce more drones.

But due to Ceasar Clown turning the facility into a toxic waste land, Vegapunk was forced to abandon the project before it could be finished, and as such its programming was unfinished.

All the destruction didn't help either, as it corrupted it.

Now while it still knew to sample the DNA of a powerful male, the objectives to find female DNA and a place to hole up and incubate the new life became the same.

Now free from its case due to the chaos, it set out to exit the facilit to fulfil its purpose.
----------------------------------------------
After some time, the subject had left the facility and now hovered above a large gathering of humans. Following its programming, and its highly advanced scanner that acted almost exactly the same as observation haki, it searched for the strongest male specimen.

It had several choices that stood out, a man with whitish hair and two cigars in his mouth, a man with a spotted cap and a long katana, a blonde man with an irregular, swirly eyebrow, and a green haired man with a scar over his left eye currently napping, just to name a few.

But one was better than the rest, he had black hair resting underneath a strawhat, and eating an absurd looking amount of meat while speaking animatedly to another young man with a long nose, and what looked like some kind of horned tanuki. To many, the young man might have seemed unassuming, but with the bugs haki like sensor, it could tell this young man was currently the strongest male in range.

Drowned out by the sound of the festivities, the bug was unheard as it flew down and quietly landed on the back of the young mans neck. Then it gently stuck its needle-like proboscis into his neck, the doctor had made sure to make the process completely painless, and started sucking blood.

After a few seconds it had enough and flew away out of their sight, the only proof it was there was a small drop of blood on the same spot.

Now it hovered back over all of them to find a female/ its new forever home, as part of the faulty programming. It was very slowly getting bigger as its inner mechanations were replicating the sample to increase the number of children.

Then it saw it, the first female to enter its view. Long orange hair in a ponytail, big brown eyes, and from the bugs knowledge of the female anatomy, a buxom and curvaceous figure. She was heading towards a ship with a figure head resembling a lion, and so the bug darted after her.
------------------------------------
3rd Person POV:

As the Nami boarded the ship and entered the Womans Quarters, she didn't close the door all the way and the bug was able to fly in, perching itself on the ceiling and watching her, even it the slight darkness of the room.

She had taken off her jacket and in a puff of smoke, it turned into a piece of rubble in her hand, simply dropping it on the floor. Underneath the jacket she had a bikini top colored a mix of red, white and orange, barely containing her large breast, and low rider jeans that clung to her lower half. Her slim and soft looking abdomen was completely exposed. She stretched a little bit before deciding to lay down, her belly facing the ceiling.

Seeing her without the jacket, the bug, which at this point had grown to the size of a roach, the bug knew that she would be a perfect candidate for completing its purpose. Silently, it glided down and rested on her thigh, then slowly crawled up to her uncovered hip. It would have to be careful, her being asleep might be the best chance it had to complete it programming. Still carefully moving up Nami's body, she had yet to react to the bugs movements. The bug then stopped next to her surprisingly deep and perfectly round belly button. It had deduced that this would be the fastest route to its destination. Slowly it began to crawl in going further down until it reached a road block, the bottom of her navel. With its front legs and proboscis, it slipped them into the tiny gap and started pulling.

Nami had responded to the sensation by slightly giggling and letting out a slight moan, finding the action ticklish, and unconsciously rubbing the skin around her belly button.

Finally, the bug had pulled the skin far enough apart for it to slip through, and it did. It's larger thorax wiggling around the rim of her navel before going in. It then proceeds further in to its final stop, her womb, it's shape bulging her skin out just a little bit.

By then, Nami had opened her eyes abruptly and sitting up. Looking around her room, she says,"I thought something was watching me." She then looks down at her stomach, feeling that it was a little tender. Rubbing it gingerly, she laid back down,"Probably just imagining things." She says to herself before turning over and going back to sleep. Totally unaware that the bug had sampled her DNA while crawling in and had now taken root within her, and it wasn't moving for anything.

Now with both sources of DNA within it, it was time for its real work to begin. Creating new humans from the combined samples, and making drones to carry the replicated samples of male DNA to other females.

A new generation of humans will soon be birthed. And it all starts within Nami's belly, which had slowly began to round out as the Queen was accelerating its own growth process to carry all the children and its new drones.

They laid their cloaks down as impromptu beds, leaving them in the dancer girl outfits Sanji got for them. After that, they closed their eyes and sleep quickly took them.

Several minutes later, the sand near them started to sift. And out came two scorpion-like shapes emerged. They looked similar, but their pincers looked more suited for pulling, and instead of stingers, their tails had a glassy shine similar to gems, and ringed around them was gold colored material. The main difference between them was that one was sapphire blue and the other was emerald green.

Quickly they scuttled over to the girls still forms , blue going to Vivi and green went to Nami. They crawled onto their bellies, towards their navels. They were small, tight little circles, seemingly too small to fit the scorpions, but they could fix that.

The glassy surface and the golden ring around it made it look like she had a decorative navel gem. But she knew exactly what this was, and before she could say anything;

"Where'd this come from?"

Looking to her side, she saw Nami, who had now awakened as well, looking down at her belly, where she now had a gem of her own, this one being green.

While Nami didn't know how or why it got there, she was pleased to have found what she believes to be something expensive. She reached down to take it so that she may examine it closer, but when she grabbed and tugged at it, it wouldn't budge, as if it had been glued into her.

"W-what are you talking about?", the navigator asked, a scared stutter in her voice.

Before the princess could explain, the both stood up abruptly, like they had no control.

"What the hell is happening now?!", Nami yelled, now really freaked out.

Then before anything else could be said, they both had begun to dance. Not just any dance, they were belly dancing. Very sensually, with lots of emphasis on their abdomens.

Nami couldn't even say anything at this point, she was so shocked. All she could do was look at Vivi with a face that pleaded for an answer. Luckily she responded.

"What you saw weren't gems, they were the tails of Dancer Scorpions. Instead of stingers they have those to attract prey and distract predators." The bluenette explained.

"That doesn't explain what's happening!"; at this point, Nami was embarrassed beyond belief at being forced to do this. Sure she had no problem showing off her body before, but at least then it was her choice.

"Well... this only happens... during their mating season...", Vivi replied back nervously.

Nami was silent for a moment, before screaming out," WHY DIDN'T YOU SAY ANYTHING EARLIER?!!" "I NEVER THOUGHT THIS WOULD HAPPEN!!!" And for the next few minutes while continuing to dance, it consisted of Nami screaming at Vivi while the princess just apologized repeatedly.

Then as abruptly as it started, they stopped. "Finally, is it over?", Nami asked while panting. While she wasn't in control of herself, it still took her energy to dance." "Yeah I think so." Vivi replied, tired as well.

But just as she said that, they both now found themselves on their backs, arms at their sides. While that was happening, they felt the digging sensation again and looked back down at their bellies. Catching the gems wiggling slightly, before being pulled into them, as if they were never there. But they felt them." You said this was over!" Nami screamed again. "I forgot! That was only the first half!" " Okay, you'd better explain everything now!!", their little back and forth went.

"The mating rituals for Dancer Scorpions is opposite to regular ones! Instead of females coming to the males, it's the other way around!", Vivi yelled, fear back in her voice.

" Wait, so that means--", you could hear the scared tone in Nami's voice, but before she could finish her sentence, they heard more sand sifting, and looking to their sides they saw themselves surrounded by dozens more scorpions, all of varying colors. The main difference between them and the two from before is that they were notably larger, signifying they were male.

Then without any warning, they all began to march forward towards the girls, who in turn felt more movement within them. Being able to look down, they saw the gems pull themselves into their bellies, leaving their navels open once again.

During all of this, they struggled to get themselves to move, but their efforts were futile.

First, two scorpions crawled onto each of them, both once again gripping their navels and pulling them open, and with two of them they were opened wider than the previous time. Only now they were wide awake and felt everything.

With the opening created, all the other scorpions dove in, the girls shrieks turned to grunts as their middles fought to accommodate all of their new guests. They tried to break free and regain control, but with the original females still within them, they weren't going anywhere.

Especially as their bellies soon began to dome out...

(Several minutes later)

"We-- Ooooh-- never speak of this. Got it?"

Un-- Hmmm-- understood."

That was the conversation between the two girls. Who now had swarms worth of scorpions within them.

Their stomachs now looked like the had swallowed grown men. Their bellies were large and spherical, the skin pulled taught. So large in fact, they couldnt see anything past them or wrap their arms around them. And on top dead center, were the gems, still attached to the tails of the pest that did this to them.

Both couldn't help but let out a moan or whimper as a tremor or bulge ran across the surfaces, reminding them all too well of their predicament.

"How much longer-- Mmph-- will this last?" Nami asked exhaustedly, hand instinctively rubbing where she felt the movement.

"It shouldn't-- Eeee-- be much longer nooooow..." replied Vivi, trailing off at first because she felt the sensation pop up near her belly button, the one spot she couldn't reach, but then she felt more pressure build up, unbearably, in that same spot.

Nami was about to ask what was wrong, but then she felt the same build-up within her. But in their state they could do nothing but scream, and clutch what parts of themselves they could reach.

Soon they could actually see their bellies stretch out with their navels still being the tips.

Then, almost with a pop and hiss, the gems retreated back into them, and the swarms of scorpions came scuttling back out. Crawling off them, heading into random directions, then sinking back beneath the sand.

Soon enough, their bellies were flat again and they found themselves able to move of their own accord. They were then treated to the sight of the scorpions who started this whole experience leaving, oddly with a male next to them, tails intertwined, the sink as well.

All the girls could do was still watch them, hands rubbing their middles, still in slight disbelief of what happened to them.

Nami the looked to Vivi and said," Again, we are never to speak of this to anyone. Clear?"

"You won't get any argument from me."

They were then treated to the sound of," I think I hear them through this wall!" Chopper's youthful voice sounded out.

(Several hours later)

The crew, after reuniting with the female members, were now camping in the night, still ways away from their goal, but getting ever closer.

The men had fallen asleep, and the girls were just getting ready to.

"Right now, I just want to go to sleep, and forget this whole day." Nami said, tired of everything.

Vivi could only let out a non-verbal agreement, too tired to say anything else.

They both just laid down, an allowed sleep to take them, now sure that nothing else would happen. Not in real life at least.

In their dreams, they were blushing, reliving the earlier events in vivid detail. Both had secretly been enraptured by the whole thing and now their imaginations were running wild in their sleep. Even rubbing their bellies again while they slept.

The cause? If you could seen their bellies, you'd find a multitude of tiny bumps poking out against the soft, delicate surfaces.

Apparently a guest didn't want to leave.
113321.title: The Dancer Scorpions

1133211.content:

Nami woke up next, snickering and giggling at the same feeling. It felt like a thousand tiny fingers tickling the walls of her innie, while a tiny mouth frenched her knot.

Vivi, weakened by the sound of Nami's slowy growing laughter, finally cracked and started laughing herself. "Ahahaha, ihehhem Sorhererey Nahahahami. I hehehehe forgot something." Vivi tried to apologize through her laughter.

"Nohohow whahahat?" Nami laughed in response.

"Ihiht seems wehehehe where uhahanluCKY!" Her laughter picked up a octave. "If the fehehehemale Dancer ssssscorpion lihehehekes a hohohost, shehehehe will leheheheve a egg. The egg hahahahatches within the dayhehehehe. The larharharva is sohahahaft and fuzzyhehehehe. It alsohohoho sucks blohohohod from the knohohohot. Tryhehehe not to lahahahagh. The mohovment excites it." The princess explained through laughter.

"Ohhohoho great. Hohohohow long arhararare we stuhuhuhuck with it?" Nami asked.

"A wehehek. But it ohohohonly feeheheheds at night. Ahahhahand it isn't dahahangerous. In fahahact, as it gehehets older, ihihihit tickles lehehess and behehehecomes more pleasurable." Vivi explained.

Both of the girls could breathe and weren't feeling any discomfort. In fact, though neither would admit it, they didn't just find it enjoyable, but arousing. After a hour, The larva seemed to slow down....

115.content: Which anime series do you choose?
115.title: More

1151311.content:
"Pan's Struggle" / "New Dragon Balls?! A Namekian's Wish Granted!!"

“Last Time on Dragon Ball GT, Goku, Pan, Trunks and Giru were in their ship, searching for the Black Star Dragon Balls in the vastness of Space, when suddenly, Giru detected a planet with 7 Dragon Balls! How could this be possible? And then suddenly, the ship was seemingly being pulled to the planet, and was going to crash into it at an extremely high speed? Are there more planets with more Dragon Balls other than Earth or Namek? Will our heroes survive!? Find out on this episode of Dragon Ball GT!”

Pan was lying down in a dark forest, far away from her ship. The ¼ saiyan girl landed in an odd position, with her legs straight, one hand behind her head, and the other on her exposed belly. Pan was wearing her usual outfit, an orange bandana, gray pants that have chains on the right side, finger-less gloves, and her red midriff-bearing shirt, but her shoes were missing as she took them off before the ship’s accident. Her stomach felt slightly queasy, so she rubbed her little tummy while she was asleep.

As she slept, she was having a dark nightmare. She had creepy, freaky alien looking bugs surrounding her, while Pan did not recognize the area where she was, at all, save for seven pillars around her and the bugs. Soon enough in the nightmare, spotting an ancient looking building close to her, Pan dashed away from the bugs to the structure’s entrance, and she just noticed that she was naked as well. The girl didn’t know what was going on or where exactly she was, and soon enough, the bugs caught up to her. Pan tried to blast them away as much as she could, but they overwhelmed her and crawled on to her body, weighing down her arms and legs, causing her to fall. Shockingly, they were strong enough to hold her down to the floor, making Pan not able to get up at all. Pan sensed a dark powerful figure approaching. She turned her head to see an adult humanoid male looking creature covered in shadows. He picked up one of the smaller bugs, examining it carefully. He nodded, and threw the bug directly to Pan, the bug landing on her tummy. The creepy bug bit around her belly for a bit, causing Pan to squirm as she felt the sharp pain on her.

“Hey, let me go you weirdo! Or else my grandpa will beat you up! And that’s only after I beat you up,” Trying to put on a strong façade did not help the girl however, and without warning, the bug dug its way inside her belly button. The power it forced made Pan lose her breath for a bit. After breathing in to regain air, she looked down at the bug wiggling inside her little navel. She tried to wiggle her stomach to shake it off, but instead it latched even harder to Pan by using its claws to hold the sides of the belly hole. Pan tried to then fly up and use her ki powers, but she couldn’t for some reason. She was weakened by some unknown force, trapped in some sort of hell.

The shadowed man snapped his fingers, causing the bug already in her belly button to dig in even faster. Pan however, started to enjoy it. Her face was blushing red, her body felt hot and had an odd and new tingling sensation. She moved her toes upward and directly curled them inward a few seconds later. The bug was now over halfway in, and Pan was slightly arching her back, and giving a slight, hard to hear moan. She closed her hands into fists, and she clenched her fists very tightly. She bit her lower lip to stop it from quivering, all as the bug wiggled its way, penetrating her tiny navel. Once in, Pan lied flat on the ground again, opened her hands, uncurled her toes, and she breathed anxiously, waiting to see what this shadowed man has in store next. Her belly button looked fine, as if nothing even touched her navel, with the only signs of something having been on her belly are the bite marks caused by the bug around her innie.

The shadowed man laughed with a loud, booming voice that echoed in the chamber they were in. The laugh stopped in and instant though, as the man snapped his fingers six times in a row, and six more bugs of similar size to the one that entered her already crawled to Pan’s belly. One by one, they entered her belly button, wiggling their way through, causing the sensation Pan felt earlier to last longer. Pan moaned loudly in pleasure, and she was sweating profusely. Even though she was trapped and uncomfortable, Pan was having an amazing time. After all the other bugs entered the young girl, the shadowed man huffed loudly and clapped his hands once, and in a bright flash, the nightmare was over.

“Wha-what in the…” Pan woke up, and she had slight trouble getting up due to the pain she received after the crash, but she thought she could just walk it off. Her pants also felt slightly wet, but that wasn’t due to pee, if you know what I mean. Looking around, the Earth girl found no signs of life on planet, save for the plant life. Thick and tall trees that seem to go on for miles that cover the sky, alien flowers blooming, a running river nearby could be heard, and beautiful blue grass around Pan’s feet.

“Goku, Trunks, Giru, where are you!?” Pan cried out. While the site was pretty, Pan was more worried for ship-mates. Pan heard no response, and she wondered where she landed and how far they are from her.

“Well, gonna have to find them myself,” The girl flew up high to get a bird’s eye view, and to her surprise it was actually day time, and more importantly, she found out that she wasn’t in a forest at all, but rather, a tower that reached high into the sky!

“Whoa! What is this place? This is just like Kami’s tower back home! Wait, that could mean…” Pan had a thought, what if there was a Namek on this planet too? What if the Dragon Balls that Giru detected were the ones a Namekian made on this planet? Pan just had to find out, so she flew back down in the ‘forest’ and started searching. While walking through the forest, her tummy was starting to feel queasy again. While Pan didn’t feel like she was going to throw up, or that she was hungry, she just feels like she has a stomach bug or something, though she can’t remember the last time she was sick. After patting her tummy, she went back searching. It wasn’t long before she found a Temple-like building in the forest, but there was no one to be seen.

“He-hello?! Anyone there?” Pan moved closer to the temple, “Uh, if there is someone here, I’m wondering if you can help me out. You see, I crashed on this planet by accident, and I’m now separated from my friends!” Pan’s feet got on temple ground, which was made of stone instead of the ground being simply grass. Pan treaded carefully on the unfamiliar land, making quiet steps to try to not bother anyone who may be there. The quarter-saiyan looked around and noticed something strange and enticing, seven pillars around the temple. She looked up at one of the pillars and noticed how far it went up in the sky. They all seemed familiar to the girl, but she couldn’t put her finger on it. Pan flew up to the top of one of the pillars, and once she was there she found a tiny Dragon Ball that was inside a hole on the side of the pillar!

“Is that a…” Pan picked on the Ball, and it fell accidentally but she caught it just in time, “No way!” Pan went to the other pillars to see if they also had Dragon Balls, and to her happiness, they do! Each pillar had a Dragon Ball, each in its own hole, each pointing to the middle of the temple ground. After grabbing all seven and fitting them neatly into her pocket, save for the 4 Star Ball she chose to hold in her hand, she flew back down to the ground, “Yes, yes, yes! I can use these to really help out Trunks and Grandpa get back our Dragon Balls, or at least use these to find them!” Pan held the Ball in front of her, looking at it and smiling. However, she didn’t notice that there was now a man behind her, who coughed rather loudly to get her attention.

“Hello there miss,” the man behind her said out-loud.

“Aggh!” Pan was surprised and accidentally tossed the 4 Star Ball into the air. She turned around and immediately went into a fighting stance, but as she guessed, Pan was right. There was Namekian here! Pan got out of her stance and stood up straight, scratching the back of her head in embarrassment, “Oh, hello there, heh heh…”

“Hrrmm,” The Namekian snatched the Dragon Ball that was falling from the sky, catching it before it hit Pan on her head, “I believe this is mine?” The Namekian held the Ball next to his face, “And I assume you have the other six. Am I correct?”

“Ugh, yes sir,” Pan sounded disappointed and handed the other Dragon Balls to the man, and bowed to apologize, “Forgive me sir!”

“Well, I can also assume that not only you know what Dragon Balls are, but you need them for something, right?” The green man held the seven Balls between each finger, leaving only the gap between his right ring and pinky finger free, “Well, what do you need them for?”

Pan shot up quickly, looking slightly distressed. She explained to the man about her home planet going to explode, her missing friends, and her crashed ship. She also gave a brief explanation on how she knows about his species, as well about Kami, Piccolo, and Dende.
“Hmm, I see. It seems that the son of Katas did end up somewhere. Fine, I will help you with your problem. Also, you can call me King. That’s what the inhabitants of this planet call me whenever I make an appearance to them,” King gave the seven Balls back to Pan, and she held them all in her hand. Pan was overjoyed, jumping up and down in glee, jumping very high up before gently floating her way down.

“So, do I need to say anything to get these things working King?” Pan asked, “Also, how did you get here or even know how to make Dragon Balls?”
1151311.title: Pan (Part 1)

11513111.content:
“I will tell you what you should say soon enough, but first I might as well tell you about myself. Take a seat somewhere if you want,” King replied, “Over there possibly,” King pointed to a table looking structure nearby, to which Pan quickly dashed to and sat on, waiting for King to start, “During the drought of my people, I and a few of my Namekian brothers decided to build a space craft to find a new planet suited for Namekian kind. We built a single ship, similar to the one the Namekian of your home. As we flew off, searching planet after planet, we were shot down by large ship. We sensed that the presences inside were many, but also that they were a few very powerful beings inside. Our ship began floating around endlessly, with no power or resources to keep us safe, and soon enough, we were near this planet’s gravitational pull. I was covered by one of my ship mates, and when the ship crashed, I was the only survivor…”

“Oh my gosh!” Pan felt terrible for King, and unbeknownst to her, there was a swarm of bugs forming behind her, “So what did you do then?”

“Survived. I fought many battles against the indigenous creatures of this planet. I found some civilized inhabitants, and they are all very weak. I never harmed them, but whenever I showed them my power, they began to fear me. Though one day, while I was sleeping in a hut of one of the tribes, a giant beast came to attack the village. I went out and defeated it quickly, protecting the village. The people rejoiced, and then held me as a God of sorts. I then started to help out more, and connected the tribes of these people together, creating a connection to these inhabitants. I was given the name King by the leaders of the tribes, and that name stuck with me since. It has been so long since my days on Namek, I forgot my old name!” The Namekian laughed a bit, which started to scare Pan slightly.

“Wow, that’s an interesting story you got there King,” Pan said.

“Oh yes, my life did become interesting,” King stopped his laughter in an instant, “But then I decided to build a tower, so I can overlook this planet. I also decided to make my own Dragon Balls, in order to wish myself off this planet and see how my own planet is doing. Sadly, my power isn’t strong enough, which is why the Dragon Balls you carry in your hands are so small. I did make my own wish, to at least see how my planet is doing, and I was relieved to see it thriving after all these years. I also built these pillars so when the Balls are flown away, they always land in the holes I placed on the pillars and I can resume them whenever it is truly needed. There are however two major flaws,”

King snapped his fingers, and the swarm that formed behind Pan caught her by surprise, and held her down to the structure. The Balls were taken by King, and he formed a sinister smile. Pan tried to fight off the bugs, but she couldn’t, her ki wouldn’t work and she couldn’t fly off! What’s going on? Wait, memories of that dream started to form back in Pan’s head. It was still very fuzzy, but she was having a great sense of Déjà vu!

“You see, these Dragon Balls are powered by the bugs that hold you down. They can slightly lower your energy, but if enough is latched on to you, you are powerless!” King exclaimed, as Pan tried to struggle her way out, “But if I insert a single bug into someone through any hole, they can absorb their energy and then power the Balls,” Pan’s belly began to move, as many bugs inside her now were wiggling to get out, causing Pan to freak out and shriek, “Sadly, to power a Dragon Ball usually requires sacrifice. So anytime I capture someone and use them to power a Dragon Ball, they always die after the bug exits their body and power up the Ball. However,” King placed one of his Dragon Balls on top of Pan’s belly button. While it wasn’t small enough to fit inside it, it was still being kept in place because of the navel. Soon, one of the bugs began to exit Pan, wiggling its way out, making Pan feel that tingly feeling she had in her dream. As it got out, it was absorbed into the Ball, making it glow bright orange. And the best part for King, Pan was fine.

“King, what did you do to me? What’s happening to me?! HOW DID YOU GET THESE BUGS INSIDE ME! IT WAS ONLY A DREAM!” Pan cried out to the high heavens, hoping that maybe, just maybe, her grandpa and friends could hear her.

“Oh, but it wasn’t a dream. You see, after these bugs enter your body, you only reinterpreted the event as a dream. I took you into my temple last night, and while you wear bathing, I found my chance! Plus, the nightmare was actually better than the reality,” King smiled even more sinisterly, his eyes filled with evil intent. Pan then remembered that night in even more vivid detail, and while she was being bugged, she remembered that King was also naked, and took advantage of her.

The truth about King is that he’s not the real King at all! He is a parasitic creature that desires to take over planets and rule the people. They find the world leaders and take over their bodies, though some “growths” have happened to the bodies the parasite takes over, usually when a certain “growth” wasn’t there at all. Pan began to cry, “I’m in some odd hell, only a dream, she’d be saved, anything, let anything happen that can end this!” she thought to herself.

King took the Dragon Ball, and placed a new one over her navel, starting the process over. A new bug wiggles out, causing Pan to moan and curl her toes again, it enters the Dragon Ball, it regains power, repeat the process. After six Dragon Balls have been restored, King decided to have a little fun. He walked over the end of the alter Pan was on, and held on to her feet. He placed each of his fingers between her toes, and he moved them around, all to freak Pan out.

“You know, I can’t remember when I had this much fun. I’m usually so busy, dealing with this planet’s people, but today… today I get to have some fun!” King let go of the girl’s feet and climbed on top of the alter. He was over Pan, but his head level was on Pan’s navel level. He looked up to Pan and grinned. He took out his tongue out, and licked the area over Pan’s belly. She winced slightly, feeling violated and powerless. King moved his tongue all around, and then he circled his tongue around her navel, and directly afterward, King inserted his tongue into Pan’s tiny navel. Her belly button got all wet and slobbery, making Pan feel extremely uncomfortable in the process. King stopped licking her belly, and cleaned the saliva with a piece of Pan’s short he just torn off. The false Namekian was ready to place the final Dragon Ball on Pan’s belly button, and once the final bug made it out, all the Balls were repowered once more!

King giggled with glee, he was ready to make his wish. He placed the Dragon Balls over Pan’s belly, and he cried out,

“RISE ETERNAL DRAGON! GRANT MY WISH!”

The sky turned black, the atmosphere became dark, and from the Balls came a powerful looking Dragon! While it wasn’t as large as the Eternal Dragon of Earth, it looked mighty, and more closely resembled a European-styled Dragon.

“I have awoken Master. Make your wish,” The Dragon was stoic, uncaring to the sights he saw beneath him.

“DRAGON! I WISH FOR THIS GIRL TO KNOW WHERE HER GRANDFATHER AND FRIENDS ARE!”

The Dragon gave Pan visions of Trunks, Goku, and Giru on another planet entirely!

“Your wish has been granted. Until we meet again, master,” The Dragon retreated into the Balls, and they began to float in the air and fly off into different directions, but because of the pillars, they were stopped in their tracks!
11513111.title: Pan (Part 2)

115131111.content:
“You see? Your friends are simply looking for you,” King pointed to Pan with his pointy finger, over her tiny navel, “Sadly, they’re far from their destination,” he then inserted his finger in her belly button, and started to wiggle it around for fun.

“Why are you doing this to me? Why?” Pan was broken, she couldn’t cry, scream, or even fight back, only question.

“Why?!” King inserted his finger even deeper into Pan, hurting the girl, “Because I can! I am King of this planet!” King took out his finger and recovered the Balls. He snapped his fingers, and seven bugs went inside Pan once more, wiggling their way inside. King repeated the process of summoning the Dragon, this time wishing for Pan’s companions to find a CLONE of Pan on the planet they are on, all fine and good. The real Pan however, was now stuck with this madman for who knows how long. King knew what he was doing, he likes his partners broken. He found them more… favorable that way. King repeated the process one last time, now wishing for Pan to be wearing a revealing royal outfit, “Now little one, you will now be my Queen! Do you accept?”

Pan was now in a new outfit that resembled something more a belly dancer would wear. She had no more bandana, but instead a small yellow tiara. Her top was a red bra with tassels on the bottom. Her pants were replaced by a long skirt that had a split that exposes her legs. Lastly, Pan now wore barefoot sandals, with its lace made out of a golden lace and covered in tiny orange pearls that resembled Dragon Balls.

The quarter saiyan was trapped, she now can only accept her fate as Queen to this King, “Yes Master King, I do,” Her eyes were dull, blank from the stress she’s gone through. King was happy, and now, she was ready for his final wish. However, a Dragon didn’t need to grant this wish. King snapped his fingers again, and a large version of the bugs came out from the temple. It was almost too big to fit inside Pan’s belly button, however, it will try. The bug got on top of Pan’s belly, found the navel, and it dug its head right in her, causing the largest amount of pain that Pan has felt in a long time. Pan felt nothing though, not even pleasure, she was too broken. The bug pushed and shoved, wiggling itself in as best as possible, slowly but surely entering her body. As the bug was getting inside, Pan’s belly grew larger and larger, it wasn’t overtly huge, rather, she looked a few months pregnant, with a firm and round belly. The bug got inside, and Pan’s mind finally broke.

“Pan, you are now my beautiful Queen, the mother to our children, and soon enough, you will birth new bugs for us to rule the universe with,” King was excited, now his plans can come into motion. His next target, Earth.

Pan struggled to stand up, mostly due to her new weight. Once on her two feet, she extended her arms to King, “You are my King, you are my Master, you are the father to our children. King, I love you,” Pan said, her mind now warped and broken.

“What’s going to happen to the real Pan? Will she ever be saved? Will her friends, or even Goku figure out that they don’t have the real Pan? What will the new couple do first as the all-powerful rulers of the planet? Find out next time on Dragon Ball GT!”
115131111.title: Pan (Final Part)

11521.content: Where do you want her bugging to take place
11521.title: Asuna

115211.content:
As Asuna was walking home with Kazuto from school one day, they had taken a detour down a dark alleyway because the sidewalk was being redone. Unfortunately for the two, especially Asuna, it was an elaborate ruse to trap unsuspecting victims. The couple kept on walking but felt uneasy, they were halfway through when Kazuto stopped. Asuna turned and looked at him, he had a very serious look on his face. She started to open her mouth and ask what was wrong when he pushed her down as something shot towards her, she looked up and saw that he got hit. he stood there for a few seconds then fell on the ground. Asuna rushed towards him to check his pulse and breathing, but was grabbed from behind, she struggled against the person and managed to get free from them. She saw a man standing above Kazuto and was holding a needle in his hand. Asuna froze, she knew what the man was about to do. She dropped to her hands and knees and cried, "Please don't kill him. I'll do whatever you want." The man stopped and looked at her, the needle was actually meant to remove the memories of the current incident and what was to come, but she didn't know that. He chuckled and went along with it, "Well we don't need him. You will do just fine. If you come along with us quietly, we will spare his life." Asuna nodded and went with them, meanwhile another man that she didn't notice with a second needle injected the serum into him and took him to a second van hidden elsewhere.

Now Asuna was in a van being taken to a secret facility where a secret government test was taking place. This test was to insert a small probe into the top of a persons spine next to the brain and use it to manipulate memories and to use the persons own eyes to spy on the world around them. The problem has been the same however. The person always had a problem with one part of their body or worse, death. But they believe they figured out a way of making it work, and Asuna is the first person to be tested with this. The van finally stops and everyone gets out including a blindfolded and handcuffed Asuna who is escorted to an odd room. It was small, had a door that led to an even smaller bathroom, there was no tub though just a shower. But the main room had a small table, a chair, a queen sized bed and a small dresser, it was much better than Asuna was expecting, almost homey, if she hadn't been kidnapped by strange men and brought to a strange place. As the men shut and locked the steel door behind her she couldn't help but go to the bed and start crying, Kazuto was hurt and almost killed by these men, she was now their captive, who knows what will happen to her. She was scared and worried, but before she knew it, she was asleep.

The next day, Asuna went and took a shower her beautiful hair clinging to her body like a skin tight shirt. 143121.content:
Ariel was enjoying her new life as princess to a surface kingdom. While she missed her old life and her family and friends under the sea, she was happy where she was. Sadly, for her, this was all about to change. While lying in bed with her husband, Ariel awoke to the sounds of a familiar voice. She opens her eyes slowly and turned her head to look around the room, it called out for her name.

“Ariel… Ariel… follow my voice Ariel…”

And for some reason, she did. The red headed princess got up from her bed, still wearing her night gown, and simply followed. It was hypnotic, entrancing, inviting even. With each quiet step, she got closer and closer to the voice. Walking all over the castle, walking as gently and carefully as she could through the dark hallways, she soon made it outside to the beach. Ariel regained some control of herself before her feet touched the water.

“Wait, who are you? Where are you?!” Ariel cried out to the dark sea.

“Enter the water child, and all will be answered…”

Ariel gulped, though she was once again hypnotically entranced by the voice. Ariel took off her night gown and her undergarments, leaving her bare naked to the elements. She slowly walked into the water. The water was cold, but Ariel didn’t mind, she was used to drastic ocean temperatures. Once her entire body was covered in water, the voice called out again.

“Swim my child, swim…”

The red headed princess did just that, as she dived under the water and swam as fast as she could, reaching further and further into the ocean. While swimming, the princess noticed that she wasn’t having any trouble breathing, and that her legs and feet felt different, yet familiar. A glowing light was coming from Ariel’s lower half, as her body was transforming back into the mermaid form it once was! Ariel noticed, but she did not care, the voice as too hypnotic, grasping all of the young lady’s attention.

For hours the red head swam to reach the voice, it was far, it came from the deepest and darkest parts of the ocean. She was heading to an underground sea cave that gave her memories of Ursula’s home. The shocking memory was enough to break Ariel out of her hypnotic hold.

“Oh no, what am I doing here? I better get out, I gotta find Eric or daddy, wait…” Ariel looked down and then it hit her, she was a mermaid once more, “Oh no, oh nononono!”

“Oh yes child, oh yes…” The voice echoed through the caves, this time sounding foreboding and closer than before, “Cloak, Dagger, seize her!” Two stingrays came out of the cave, swimming at extremely fast speeds, getting to Ariel before she could even react properly. They surrounded the princess, swimming close to her, with their stingers right on her belly. Cloak pinched Ariel a bit on the side with his dagger, stinging Ariel slightly, while Dagger placed his stinger tail right in Ariel’s tight navel, and any time she moved slightly, her belly button felt a slight cut or sting.

A menacing figure out of the caves, it was a woman with eight long tentacles on the lower half of her body, and an aura that screamed “sea witch”. However, unlike Ursula, this woman was thin and slender. The woman talked.

“Well, well, well, look what we have here. The famous little mermaid herself, daughter of Trident, reason of my sister’s demise! Ariel,” The witch laughed as the look on the mermaid’s face became one of shock.

“Ursula’s sister?” Her heart pumped and her body shook slightly, which only made the stinger inside her belly button hurt her even more, and the other stinger continually poked the side of her body.

“Yes, sister. You have, what was it, twelve of them? Must have been a pain, growing up with Ursula was dreadful. Mother always compared her to me, criticizing every little thing I do,” The witch than began to do a mocking voice, “Oh Morgana, why can’t you be more like your sister, your witch craft is too weak, why aren’t you good enough?” Morgana went back to her normal voice, “Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah!” The witch then turned around and commanded the stingrays and Ariel to follow her. The rays moved Ariel along with them so she wouldn’t get a chance to swim away.

Deeper and deeper into the caves, they settled into an area that seemed to be the witch’s home. The witch spoke,

“So Ariel, while I don’t like my sister very much, I still don’t like what you did to her. I wanted to one day kill her and overthrow the sea kingdom, but I guess I’ll have to settle with accomplishing one of my goals,”

“You’ll never rule the ocean, just like your sister, you’ll be defeated! Once word gets out that I’m missing, you are in such deep trouble,” Ariel fired back.

“Oh, you think I’m going to keep you here? Oh no my sweat child,” The witch brushed her hand on the side of Ariel’s torso, causing Ariel to moan a bit, “You’ll be set free, and you won’t remember this night at all,” The witch pushed Ariel back on to the wall, making the stingrays leave, but tentacles came from the walls and held down the mermaid’s arm and tail back. The girl struggled to get out, groaning in annoyance, trying to use all of her strength to be set free, but it was no use.

Morgana laughed sinisterly, as she was making a concoction nearby. Her tentacles on the other hand were doing something else, as they all went closer to Ariel, reaching to her torso. A few of them held around the torso, the suction cups sticking onto her and quickly popping off. This made little visible marks show up on her belly, one of them being a big red mark over her belly button. Then a single tentacle decided to have some fun, and it played with Ariel’s belly button. It went directly inside the navel, and tickled it, making the princess laugh and twist even more to try and get off. Then, two other tentacles got in and tickled her sides, and two more tickled the sides of the red head’s navel, all of which made Ariel lose her breath, crying from intense laughter.

This was all for the witch’s amusement. A non-calm before the storm. The tentacles retreated back away, and Morgana came in to play. She cackled like a maniac, and pulled out a bug. The bug looked dangerous and mean, almost like a monster that was shrunken down. Ariel begged for mercy, trying to catch her breath as best as she can. But the witch didn’t listen, she didn’t want or have to. All she wanted was for her plan to work.

Morgana gave Ariel’s belly a little kiss, which disgusted the poor trapped mermaid, and then the witch placed the bug over Ariel’s belly button. She let go, and the bug immediately dug itself into her navel. The stinging pain was many times worse than the stingrays, and more uncomfortable than the tentacles combined! It dug and bit and clawed its way into Ariel, as quickly and painfully as it could. The mermaid, sadly, was in agony. She groaned and cried, her belly was hurting bad enough already, but now her tiny little innie was getting ripped open by some dark creature. All she can do was to scream wildly, and as she screamed and cried, the bug only went harder, pushing itself in as best as it could to get inside Ariel.

The witch cackled once more, her companion stingrays laughing alongside her too. While the bug was digging in Ariel, she went up close to the princess and brushed her hand on the girl’s face and said,

“Oh, you poor baby, you must be so scared,” Morgana smiled while looking at the mermaid’s distraught face, “Now you must be wondering “What is my plan?” and “Why I put that bug that’s trying to get inside you for?”, all in due time…” The sea witch condescendingly pinched Ariel’s cheeks and went back to her previous position.

The creepy crawler was almost fully inside the girl, only a little more time, a little more pain and suffering for the red headed princess. As soon as it was able to create a hole big enough to fit in, the bug slithered quickly inside, with its slimy substance being left on the sides of the open hope in Ariel’s belly button. Miraculously for Ariel, the hole started to close up and heal, all due to the goo produced by the bug.

With the bug insider her, she felt the slithering thing move all over insider her tight belly, and she cried once more thinking the worst. That was, until Morgana revealed her plan.

“Oh Ariel, I’m not sorry for what I did, and I have my reasons why. You see, what you carry inside you… is my child,” Morgana got closer, placing her hand over Ariel’s belly, “Our child, and once that child is fully developed and ready to be birthed while you’re a human, he will gain the ability to switch becoming a human and a mermaid at his leisure, and he will have a strong desire to take down your father!” The witch put one of her fingers inside Ariel’s innie and started to play with it, twisting and turning it around for fun, “Through our baby, I will rule Atlantis, I will rule the sea, I will rule the land above! But you won’t remember this, you won’t remember tonight at all,” The sea witch placed her lips on the mermaid, kissing her softly, putting a spell that knocked her out.

The next very early morning, Ariel woke up in her bed in a dire state. She looked around and saw that she was still in the castle, still next to Eric, and she reached to feel her legs and toes, and yup, she was still fully human. She sighed in relief and dismissed whatever she thought was real last night as to be a dark nightmare, though Ariel doesn’t really remember much of last night, or isn’t even interpreting the incident correctly. Like with all dreams and nightmares, we just forget what we dreamt of by morning.

Ariel placed a hand on her belly. She breathed in and out, calming herself to truly relax her mind, but she could have sworn, even as her hand was above her night gown, she felt something slither inside her belly…
143121.title: Little Mermaid
